description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in realmag777 WordPress Meta Data and Taxonomies Filter (MDTF) allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WordPress Meta Data and Taxonomies Filter (MDTF): from n/a through 1.3.3.4.

product.name: WordPress Meta Data and Taxonomies Filter (MDTF)
